details:
The YUI team reports:

> Vulnerability in YUI 2.4.0 through YUI 2.9.0
> ============================================
>
> A XSS vulnerability has been discovered in some YUI 2 .swf files
> from versions 2.4.0 through 2.9.0. This defect allows JavaScript
> injection exploits to be created against domains that host affected
> YUI .swf files.
>
> If your site loads YUI 2 from a CDN (yui.yahooapis.com,
> ajax.googleapis.com, etc.) and not from your own domain, you
> are not affected. YUI 3 is not affected by this issue.
summary: YUI JavaScript library -- JavaScript injection exploits in Flash components
